name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions like mass cure light wounds, except that it cures 3d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +35).
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则减半 (无害) 或 意志, 通过则减半; 见文本
spellResistance_zh: 可 (无害) 或 可; 见文本
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘群体治疗轻伤 (cure light wounds, mass)’一般，不过它能治疗 {3d8+CL (最高+35)} 点伤害。
